segments.text: I think it's about time that we had to go .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What ? Won't you have more drinks ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'd love to , but I have to get up early tomorrow and get to the office on time .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh ! I'm sorry , but I wish you could stay .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thank you for a very enjoyable evening and your hospitality .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Don't mention it . You can come whenever You are free .
segments.speaker: S2
